Description: The following statement contains a magic number: editText.EditingChanged += (object sender' EventArgs e) =>  {  	if (editText.Text.Length == 8) {  		unlockButton.Enabled = true;  	}  	else {  		unlockButton.Enabled = false;  	}  };
